JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Bring in Taulov are looking for warehouse workers for dayshift and nightshifts.
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Adecco is looking for substitutes for Bring in Taulov for day + night shifts.

We are looking for flexible employees to be part of the team at Bring. These are primarily day-to-day temporary positions for the night team which are flexible to work. Shifts primarily occur on workdays but can also be weekends.

Your role:

As a warehouse employee, you will work independently, but also work in collaboration with others in the department.
It is important that you have a sense of pace and precision, as you will be an important part of the package sorting.

Tasks:

Package sorting in cages by postcodes.
Emptying packages and sort them on pallets or cages by postcodes.

Job profile:

You are motivated and have the desire to take on new challenges.
In addition, you as a person are meeting stable with a positive attitude.
You know how to keep a certain pace.
You are ready for physical work, some heavy lifting can occur occasionally.
You can work independently and are good at creating an overview of the workflow.
You are structured, quality-conscious and have a serious approach to your tasks.
You can speak, read and understand english or danish.

Practical information:

Shifts can occur during any day of the week.
The workplace will be in Taulov. The address is Kongens Kvarter 14.
You must be responsible for transport to and from the workplace.

Working hours:

Day shift: 12.00 - 16:00 (Monday - Friday) - These shifts can be extended so it is important that you are flexible. E.g. some shifts can be 11.00 - 17.00 or 10.00 - 16.00 depending on the amount of packages. We are able to promise more and regular shifts on day shifts.
Night shift: 23:00 - 06.30 (Sunday / Monday - Friday).

Salary:

Salary: DKK 152,- DKK/hourly
Supplement after agreement of DKK 41.72 /hr. after 6pm.
Nightshifts total salary/hourly: 194,67 DKK/hr

Why choose us?

Your employer will be Adecco A / S, which offers you affiliation with consultants, who ensure that your interests are taken care of, and who are always ready to help you.
As an HR partner for our customer, it is our job to find the right employees.
With our customer, you as a temporary employee will be part of a company where the atmosphere is great, and you will certainly be welcomed with open arms.

Interested?

We are constantly looking for employees, and therefore regularly take candidates in for interviews. If the above has piqued your interest, please apply for the position via our website. Do not hold back as we hire as soon as we have the right candidates.
Please write in the application if you are applying for day, evening or night shifts and if you want full-time or individual shifts and when you can start.
If you have any questions, you are always welcome to contact us on +45 3838 7070 between 09.00 - 16.00 on weekdays.
We are looking forward to hear from you.
